!Warehouse Keeper Parman: Do you know? That Dwarves like me are all members of a union? And that you must pass a severe test to be a upper class member? You must not think that being a member of the union is an easy life, just because we are always smiling. Even within the Dwarf society, there is fierce competition,and never ending challenge in order to survive. (Quest for Dwarven characters of level 37 and above.)
